::Reptilica::

Reptilica sighs. He really didn't like this. Atma was the only one paying any 
attention to him.

"Allright," he says, walking toward Tarantulus, "I'm going to repeat what I 
have to say. We've just saved these Predacons' skid plates in the last battle 
against the Maximals," Reptilica pauses, wondering if he was talking to the 
right person. Tarantulus looked like he was in charge, "Anyways, Zardus is 
willing to help the Predacons, you know, protect you guys while you're this 
weak," Reptilica was trying to sound superior here, "So, do you want the 
Alliance's help?"
